CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We realized a slightly bathochromic shift of the PIDT - DTNT absorbance relative to that of the PIDT - EHNT , which was in consistent with the trend realized in solution , while PIDT-C12NT showed a pronounced bathochromic shift of the low energy band absorption with λ max moved from 593 nm in solution to 619 nm as thin film.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT - DTNT |
| PIDT - EHNT |
| PIDT-C12NT |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT - DTNT |
| PIDT - EHNT |
| PIDT-C12NT |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names based on the context. "PIDT", "DTNT", "EHNT", and "C12NT" are all different materials mentioned in the paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We realized a slightly bathochromic shift of the PIDT - DTNT absorbance relative to that of the PIDT - EHNT , which was in consistent with the trend realized in solution , while PIDT-C12NT showed a pronounced bathochromic shift of the low energy band absorption with λ max moved from 593 nm in solution to 619 nm as thin film.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| bathochromic shift |
| PIDT - DTNT absorbance |
| PIDT - EHNT absorbance |
| low energy band absorption |
| λ max |
| PIDT-C12NT absorbance |
| solution |
| thin film |
| 593 nm |
| 619 nm |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| bathochromic shift |
| PIDT - DTNT absorbance |
| PIDT - EHNT absorbance |
| low energy band absorption |
| λ max |
| PIDT-C12NT absorbance |

Note: "realized" and "in consistent with the trend" do not clearly refer to material properties and have been removed.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We realized a slightly bathochromic shift of the PIDT - DTNT absorbance relative to that of the PIDT - EHNT , which was in consistent with the trend realized in solution , while PIDT-C12NT showed a pronounced bathochromic shift of the low energy band absorption with λ max moved from 593 nm in solution to 619 nm as thin film.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value            |
|-------------------------|
| bathochromic shift of PIDT - DTNT absorbance |
| λ max of PIDT - DTNT in solution |
| λ max of PIDT - DTNT as thin film |
| bathochromic shift of PIDT-C12NT low energy band absorption |
| λ max of PIDT-C12NT in solution |
| λ max of PIDT-C12NT as thin film |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value            |
|-------------------------|
| bathochromic shift of PIDT - DTNT absorbance |
| bathochromic shift of PIDT-C12NT low energy band absorption |
| λ max of PIDT - DTNT in solution |
| λ max of PIDT - DTNT as thin film |
| λ max of PIDT-C12NT in solution |
| λ max of PIDT-C12NT as thin film |

Explanation:

* "We realized a slightly bathochromic shift of the PIDT - DTNT absorbance" and "PIDT-C12NT showed a pronounced bathochromic shift of the low energy band absorption" are statements about a change in wavelength, which can be considered a material property.
* "relative to that of the PIDT - EHNT" and "in solution" and "as thin film" provide additional context about the measurement conditions, but do not directly refer to a material property value. Therefore, they were removed.
* "which was in consistent with the trend realized in solution" and "while" are conjunctions and were also removed.
